name: Corrado Fabi
introduction: Corrado Fabi is a retired Italian driver. Born on April 12 1961 in Milan, he is the younger brother of Teo Fabi. After winning the 1982 European Formula Two championship, he drove for Osella in 1983. When that ride ended, he substituted for his brother three times at Brabham in 1984, while Teo was racing in the US CART series. After that Corrado drove in the US himself for a couple of years, before retiring to manage the family business interests.
